text: I’m creating a dnd footer partial for a theme and none of the modules included are showing in the global content editor. I’ve been digging through the internet and HubSpot for possible solutions, but am hitting a wall. Does anyone know why my footer partial wouldn’t be rendering on any pages or in the global content editor? Thanks!

Hi <@U01C6BC4TJT>
It looks like without seeing the code for a partial it’d be hard for someone here give you any hint. Could you please share it?
